name: Ballad's Quest
description:
This is actually just a game I've created for someone on deviantart (GeoffNET) for his birthday.

I've done the sprites for his OC, Ballad, all the way back in August, and in April, I felt the need to make a game with these sprites. With Geoff's birthday coming pretty soon, I figured it would not only be great timing, but I would also get to give him a present in the only way I could!
